channel.title: Burnout on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Burnout on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: Burnt Out on Burnout
item.description: There has been a common underlying theme in several of my conversations recently. I think the title of this post gave it away – maybe I should have been a bit more sneaky and teased the story better. Next time. As I was contemplating how prevalent burnout is among women who love to serve in ministry, who are sooooo ready to use their gifts, I realized what a marvelous scam it is for the enemy.

item.title: days #13 & #14
item.description: learning to simplify. it’s hard to experience passion when i’m pulled in numerous directions. i might mistake the ache of excitement for just an ache of overload — if i feel the ache at all. throughout the past several years, i’ve been learning about setting boundaries. this includes knowing my limits & respecting them, while also pushing those that have growth potential. this requires some interesting conditional formatting in my life’s excel table.
